section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains a description (and optionally the content) of any documents held by the sender relevant to this ICSR.

stentry.p: "This data element contains the actual content of [the document] if the sender chooses to send the document." - ICH E2B(R3), C.1.6.1.r.1

"A description of the documents held by the sender relevant to this ICSR (e.g. clinical records, hospital records, autopsy reports, ECG strips, chest X-ray, or photographs) should be listed individually in this data element." - ICH E2B(R3), C.1.6.1.r.1
